About LBX

Our Mission

We enhance the Liberty experience by producing both in-venue and broadcast excellence.

Our Teams

Campus Production

Handles all non-sport live production, audio, and visual. Youâ€™ll most often see us at Convocation or Campus Community.

Sports Production

Providing gameday coverage of 175+ sporting events each season.

Broadcast Engineering

Provides technical support to maintain a level of broadcast excellence.

Flames Central

Weekly syndacated show telling the stories and legacy of Flames athletics.

C.A.D. Video

Develops 1000+ videos a year for academic classrooms.

The Journey

Grammy nominated radio station bringing Virginia the latest in adult contemporary Christian music.
